#summary Building instructions

= Building the WebGIS Public API JS library =

Building the library is essentially a simple process combining the .js source files into one. The benefit is making it simplier to include WebGIS in a project and also some performance is gained since the browser doesn't have to download lots of individual files.

You can use the included .jsb file to build automatically. This file is read by the tool [http://code.google.com/p/js-builder JSB Builder], which is a .NET application originated from the Ext JS project.
